Field Detail

PAGE_NOT_FOUND

public static final com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite PAGE_NOT_FOUND
A composite that is displayed when this object is requested to show a child page that it cannot find.

contentProxy

protected final CompositeProxy contentProxy
Proxy that delays the creation of the content; the Page class operates solely on this proxy and doesn't evoke getContent() method. By this fact initialization of the content is delayed until the moment when content is being shown.

labelProxy

protected final CompositeProxy labelProxy
Proxy that delays the creation of the label; the Page class operates solely on this proxy and doesn't evoke getLabel() method. By this fact initialization of the label is delayed until the moment when label is being shown.

contentWrapper

protected final com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.FlowPanel contentWrapper
Wrapper that will enable to style the content of this page.

Constructor Detail

Page

public Page(java.lang.String url)
This constructor (obligatory to evoke by subclasses) only registers the url of the page.

Parameters:
url - url unique for each page; if not unique - a random one wil be generated; attention, upon each refresh of the webpage the random values will be different! (no seeding - it is not yet implemented in gwt).

setOmmitDefaultContent

public void setOmmitDefaultContent(boolean ommitDefaultContent)
If true, the page will not show its default (embbeded) content but display the first child; when childless - the default content will be shown. Default: true.

Parameters:
ommitDefaultContent -

showInitialContent

public final void showInitialContent()
Displays the default content of this page or the first child (if it has chidren and the ommitDefaultContent variable is set as 'true').

showChildPage

public final void showChildPage(int index)
Displays the content of the child page (of specified index)

Parameters:
index - index of the child to be displayed, acceptable values: [0 - getChildPageCount() )

showChildPage

public final void showChildPage(java.lang.String url)
Displays the content of the child page (of specified url)

Parameters:
url - url of the child to be displayed

public final Page getParentPage()
Returns parent page of this object.

Returns:
page that is higher in menu hierarchy

getSelectedChild

protected final int getSelectedChild()
Returns the index of the selected (visible) child page, or -1 if none of the children is visible (i.e. the default or custom content is displayed)

Returns:

protected abstract void updateStyle()

Invoked right after a content of this page has been changed.

setDisabled

public void setDisabled(boolean disabled)
If set to true, the label of this page should not be clickable and the content of this page should not be visible. Although the label itself should remain seen. This behaviour should be implemented by subclasses. Default: false.

isDisabled

public boolean isDisabled()
Informs whether the label of this page is clickable and the content is visible.

Returns:
